name: eyemagine/mediasymlinkfix
description: Fixes an issue in Magento CE 1.8.1.0 and EE 1.13.1.0 where using a symlinked media directory breaks CMS upload functionality in the admin. Must be enabled in the Admin under System > Config > Advanced > Developer

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
